Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

IceClear/SeedVR2

One-step video restoration with a diffusion transformer

View on index

Related repos

  • diffusion transformer models for video restoration
  • Real-time diffusion-based video super-resolution
  • Image restoration using diffusion-yielded score priors
  • inpainting and outpainting for images and video using any diffusion model
  • Upscale, denoise, and interpolate videos
  • personalized video generation from a single image using diffusion transformer
  • video virtual try-on framework using video diffusion transformer for swapping clothes in videos
  • LTX-Video, open source code for a model that generates videos from prompts or images using diffusion transformers
  • Diffusion transformer for image generation with sub-second latency
  • video upscaling and restoration for ComfyUI using SeedVR2, supports multi-GPU
